events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Ticket categorised under refund as customer has requested money back for the wrong product received.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and Iâ€™ll be assisting you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund, may I have a photo of the item you received as well as the order number, please?
Here is my order number 67890 and the photo of the wrong item. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund and arrange a prepaid return label for you within the next 24 hours.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and help with my refund.
Your refund has been processed and you will receive an email with the return shipping label shortly.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and the return process was smooth. Please reach out if you need any more assistance.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
